projects.title: Adoka Mini mobile App
projects.motivation: A mobile application created during my Bachelor 3 internship in the company Amifor to promote their web application.
projects.desc: This application is a simplified version of their web application Adoka, which allows you to take tests to know your main intelligences (Logic-Mathematical, Verbal, etc.. ). These tests allow you to adapt your teaching according to the most common intelligences in a group.

projects.title: Cliday mobile App
projects.motivation: A mobile application made for the Coddity grant I won.
projects.desc: The topic of the contest was focused on global warming, so I developed an application that allows you to make a quiz with new questions daily on topics close to the climate. A statistics page with a diagram is available to see its improvement if you register with an account.
